title: Roll of Thunder Gift Set: Roll of Thunder, Hear My Cry, Let the Circle Be Unbroken, the Road to Memphis
description: Ages 10 and up. Pub: 9/96.In the deep south of the 1930s and early 40s, Cassie Logan and her family stand together and stand proud to defy racial prejudice and violence. Now, to commemorate Roll of Thunder, Hear My Cry's 20th anniversary, the unforgettable saga of the Logan family is available in a boxed set--Roll of Thunder, Hear My Cry, Let the Circle Be Unbroken and The Road to Memphis.
author: Mildred D. Taylor
